name: Meryl
description: Complex swordfight simulation seemingly used for calibration. Anyway, not something for the average person.

set.set_2: If HP is less than **30%** after being attacked, gain a shield equal to **20%**/**26%**/**32%**/**40%** of Max HP for **10** seconds. Cooldown: **90** seconds.
set.set_4: Increase Whirlwind's damage by **36%**/**45%**/**54%**/**63%** and restore HP equal to **30%**/**38%**/**44%**/**50%** of the damage dealt while Whirlwind is active. The maximum HP restored every **0.5** seconds cannot exceed **60%**72%/**81%**/**90%** of ATK.
